name: Grid Diver
description:
Grid Diver

You are the ball which flies through space and you love blue color, you were just born this way. On your way you'll encounter obstacles which you cannot hit or you'll die. You can avoid obstacles and earn points if you dive under an obstacle and paint it with blue. This is done by tapping the screen. The distance you dive for is fixed and is marked by a small dot in front of you.

Test your skills and see how many you are able to avoid and paint blue!
